title: BBC Horizon Collection (512 Episodes)
description:
The classic BBC documentary series, aired since 1964. Since I created the last Horizon collection in 2011 I've continued to collect them and upgrade the quality of the episodes when I found a better source. This is the result so far.

This is every episode I've been able to find available online during five years of collecting Horizon episodes. It's far from complete, and will never be so, since alot of the episodes don't even exist anymore, but it's the most complete collection available.

The quality of the episodes varies depending on the source. I've done my best to find as good a version as I could for the episodes, but especially the oldest episodes only exists in lower quality rips. The newer episodes are mostly in HD, like they where aired. Some episodes have subtitles, at times collected with the video file in a MKV container and some times in its own file.

All episodes are tagged with season/episode number, as well as episode title, according to theTVdb.com. So it's ready to just drop into your HTPC :-)

This is a pretty big torrent, so please help out and seed when you are done so more people can get this.
